references.reason: This paper is foundational for the watermarking techniques discussed in the paper, introducing a method for watermarking GPT outputs which the authors improve upon.

references.paper_title: A watermark for Large Language Models
references.reason: This paper is among the most important as it proposes a watermarking scheme for LLMs that is cited in the paper as a state-of-the-art technique.

references.paper_title: Robust distortion-free watermarks for language models
references.reason: This paper proposes another state-of-the-art watermarking scheme for LLMs which the paper compares against.

references.paper_title: Mark My Words: analyzing and evaluating language model watermarks
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark for evaluating LLM watermarking schemes that is used in this paper to assess the performance of WaterMax.
This paper is highly relevant as it proposes an alternative watermarking method which the paper compares WaterMax against.
